query: select l_suppkey, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) from {0} where l_shipdate >= date '1993-01-01' and l_shipdate < date '1993-01-01' + interval '3' month group by l_suppkey;
subquery: select count (*) from {0} where l_shipdate >= date '1993-01-01' and l_shipdate < date '1993-01-01' + interval '3' month;

query: select l_returnflag, l_linestatus, sum(l_quantity) as sum_qty, sum(l_extendedprice) as sum_base_price, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) as sum_disc_price, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount) * (1 + l_tax)) as sum_charge, avg(l_quantity) as avg_qty, avg(l_extendedprice) as avg_price, avg(l_discount) as avg_disc, count(*) as count_order    from {0}    where l_shipdate <= date '1998-12-01' - interval '71 days'    group by l_returnflag, l_linestatus    order by l_returnflag, l_linestatus;
subquery: select count (*) from {0} where l_shipdate <= date '1998-12-01' - interval '71 days';

query: select    sum(l_extendedprice * l_discount) as revenue   from    {0}   where    l_shipdate >= date '1994-01-01'    and l_shipdate < date '1994-01-01' + interval '1' year    and l_discount between 0.08 - 0.01 and 0.08 + 0.01    and l_quantity < 24;
subquery: select count (*) from {0} where l_shipdate >= date '1994-01-01';
select count (*) from {0} where l_discount between 0.08 - 0.01 and 0.08 + 0.01

query: select ORDERKEY from {0} group by ORDERKEY having sum(QUANTITY) > 313
